title: Feddback 1.0
body:
Hi, i just started with lol alpha client, testing, and so far, i wanna thanks riot for this chance.

Anyway, i love this way the client shows up, every screen, link and so.  But, one thing, play button, remains dark, so i cant play lol, and alpha zone, for feedbacks is not working.

that's all so far!

ty{{summoner:21}}

replies.body: ok, i just went into aram .....
